Name: Ragunna Holiday
Description: Outside Ragunna City, you run into Phoebe, who's on vacation. After the Carnevale, she decides to go on a pilgrimage to restore her peace of mind. Eager to show you Ragunna's wonders, she invites you to travel with her. Will this journey lead you to the answers you seek?
QuestDesc: Outside Ragunna City, you run into Phoebe, who's on vacation. After the Carnevale, she decides to go on a pilgrimage to restore her peace of mind. Eager to show you Ragunna's wonders, she invites you to travel with her. Will this journey lead you to the answers you seek?

Conditions.PreQuestName: What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look over there! Just ahead is the famed Thorncrown Rises, built by the old nobility.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was originally constructed to honor the oracle that guided people through storms, symbolizing the Ragunnesi's reverence for the sea.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After many years, the old nobility, led by the Fisalia family, eventually left Thessaleo Fells.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The great Thorncrown Rises, once a proud emblem of the Fisalia family, was then abandoned, much like their fading glory.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To this day, it remains a testament to a bygone greatness.

Options.PlotLineKey: Weren't they the troublemakers in the Carnevale incident?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed, they were involved in the Carnevale incident, and there are still many unanswered questions... I wonder how they view the Sentinel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember Gilberto mentioning something about...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, that can't be right... Oh, I'm sorry for rambling. Please, forget I said anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, now that we're here, what do you think of Thessaleo Fells?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm glad you enjoy it here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, I've noticed you've been staring at something for a while...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you wish to explore further, be wary of unexpected dangers. It's best to be fully prepared.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, I've noticed you've been staring at something for a while...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Visual effects? What do you mean?

Options.PlotLineKey: Turn around, and you'll see it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's behind me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my... Wh-what are those? Are they dangerous Tacet Discords that need purification? How did I not sense anything...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No... Don't come any closer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: C-calm down, Phoebe. Breathe. The greater the danger, the more we must hold on to the Sentinel's wisdom.

Options.PlotLineKey: I feel like I've seen them before...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh? Really... I suppose the wisps don't appear hostile...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, do you know what these are?

Options.PlotLineKey: I think I saw one in Penitent's End.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Penitent's End? I've never set foot there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ever since I met you, it feels like I've encountered so many unfamiliar things.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, do you happen to have a recording Echo or a camera? I'd love to capture this moment to study further.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, are you alright? What are Tacet Discords doing here...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Were they drawn by the wisps too? Usually, there shouldn't be so many around this area.

Options.PlotLineKey: I think I just saw a...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes? Did you discover something?

Options.PlotLineKey: I think I saw an Echo out there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eh? Did you... Perhaps the fighting has taken a toll. Would you like to stop for a short break?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We'll be heading east. Beyond Thessaleo Fells lies Averardo Vault.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's going to be a long journey, so please, do let me know if you feel like resting at any point.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, you saw an Echo? What was it like? Its color? And type? I'm curious!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem... My apologies. I got a little carried away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, let's keep going. We're heading east, and once we cross Thessaleo Fells, we'll reach Averardo Vault.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's going to be a long journey, so please, do let me know if you feel like resting at any point.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect! I've saved the necessary data for further study. Thank you so much for your assistance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But why do unique phenomena from Penitent's End appear here in Thessaleo Fells?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, be careful {PlayerName}! Tacet Discords are approaching!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here we are! You can now see the outline of Oakheart Highcourt, nestled deep within the Fagaceae Peninsula.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In ancient times, the ancestors of Rinascita discovered a sacred shrub growing in Oakheart Highcourt.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It grew from the roots of a grand oak at the court's center, its fruits a rich russet, its flowers vibrant. The branches were said to be a medium for communing with the Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Legend has it that it was on that magnificent oak tree that the Sentinel inscribed the very first oracle.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since then, the fruit was regarded as a holy offering, used by the Order in rituals to commune with the Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The people of Ragunna crafted barrels from this oak to brew fine wines, offering this joy as a tribute to the Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In those days, the bond between the people and the Sentinel was much stronger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, wait! I see it, {PlayerName}! More wisp traces...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's photograph them first. From the looks of it, the Echo should be nearby.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out! Tacet Discords are approaching again! Wait...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They seem to be hunting something... Is that an Echo they're chasing?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've never seen an Echo like that before... I must help it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: F-finally... We-we caught up...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's take down these Tacet Discords first, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well done, {PlayerName}! It's safe now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it still seems scared... I want to help it, but...

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm sure you can do that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}... but I...

Options.PlotLineKey: Remember what you told me before?
"It is not the lighthouse that guides us through the storm to safety..."
"But our own eyes fixed on the shore."

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, those are the words of Imperator, the Sentinel... I'm surprised you still remember them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I understand now. No, I should have understood sooner...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phoebe nods at you, gathers her courage, and extends her hand toward the Echo once more.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, we've met before. I'm Phoebe, and I promise I won't hurt you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You must have been living in fear... I can feel how anxious your frequency is.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can feel a connection forming between Phoebe's Terminal and the Echo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see... so that's how it's been, hmm?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You were brought into this world by accident, forced to leave your homeland... You never registered with the Terminals of Rinascita and had to wander in the wilderness. Then, you were attacked...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry for prying into your past, but this is how I can help you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your misfortune, your fear, and your long journey for survival... I'm so sorry.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't say, "I completely understand you." That wouldn't be true.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But as an Acolyte of the Order, I promise you that I will give my all to help you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you want to return home, I will help you find a way to cross the ocean to Penitent's End...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can feel the Echo's wariness and hostility gradually fading away.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But before that, please let me check your frequencies, or let me try tuning you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You were hurt by those Tacet Discords, and if your injuries are left unattended it could be dangerous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Echo nods in agreement. With Phoebe's help, its injuries are quickly healed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for trusting me. Your injuries are healed, and you no longer have anything to fear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, all that's left is to find a way to send you back home... Hmm...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Typically, you can only reach Penitent's End by taking the Pilgrim's Sail. But now that we're here, that means...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Echo shakes its head and approaches Phoebe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh? Are you saying...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You want to return to Ragunna with me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh my, thank you... Thank you so much for trusting me. I...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, I... I did it!

Options.PlotLineKey: (Take out your camera and capture this moment)

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, that's about it. Thank you so much, {PlayerName}. These pictures are wonderful.

Options.PlotLineKey: Made in Jinzhou. We make believe.
Zoom Camera: delight you as always.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, it's not just about the photos…

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's about… your performance at the Carnevale, and this journey we've shared…

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ever since we met, I feel like whenever I feel lost, you've been there to encourage me in some way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's almost like you are one of the Sentinel's revelations...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem, moving on now... Penitent's End is the final stop in our Ragunna tour.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I remember you've been here before? Have you heard any of its stories?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Legend has it that long ago, before the Dark Tide, Penitent's End wasn't the forbidden land it is today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Echo beside Phoebe nods in agreement.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back then, the Ragunnesi worshipped here and made pilgrimages to this place. By its sandy beaches, flocks of white birds would soar across the sky.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Falcons would swoop down from the cliffs, startling the gulls into spirals of white as they took flight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If only I could see that with my own eyes.

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, the actual scenery serves as the standard...
It was a total travel fraud!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, after all, it was only after the Dark Tide that this place became forbidden... transformed into what it is now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I want to know, {PlayerName}, after what you've seen, how do you feel about Ragunna?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it... a wonderful place to you?

Options.PlotLineKey: It has a lot of strong monsters.
It's a place with a great tour guide.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly. That's how I feel too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh… that's a unique perspective. I'm glad you appreciate it, even if it's for a strange reason.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh... If you think I've done well as a tour guide, I'm relieved...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Growing up in the Order, there are many things I never really considered. I-I can't even name my exact feelings for Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the past, the Sentinel bore all my confusion and responsibilities.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But now, through this journey with you, I'm beginning to understand myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I realize now that to me, Ragunna is the most wonderful place in the world. Nothing compares to it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Along the way, we've captured stunning sights, revisited pieces of Ragunna's history, and even rescued this little one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Echo beside Phoebe nods in agreement.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe all these experiences are the revelation the Sentinel intended for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The true meaning behind the Sentinel's oracles lies in the happiness found in purity and unity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Honestly, I didn't fully understand these words, so I took a long leave to go on this pilgrimage in search of meaning.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though I'm still not entirely clear…

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I won't let confusion hold me back any longer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps it's because I've met the legendary "Righteous One"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you from the bottom of my heart, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This has been a wonderful trip. I believe this brief but meaningful experience will stay with me forever.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As an Acolyte, I'm not supposed to express my feelings so openly…

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if you ever want to hear more stories about Ragunna, you're always welcome to visit me at the Cathedral.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh dear... I'm so relieved... Thank you for your help, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How frightened it looks... The Tacet Discords must have hurt it terribly.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I... I want to help it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encouraged by your support, Phoebe reaches out her hand toward the Echo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, I mean no harm. I promise I won't hurt you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My name is Phoebe, and I'm an Acolyte of the Order. May I take a look at your injuries?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Echo watches Phoebe warily as she gets closer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I haven't seen you at the Order. You're not a registered Common Echo, are you? Where did you come from?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't seem well. Please let me help... Ah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As Phoebe takes another step closer, the Echo transforms into a will-o'-the-wisp and flees.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, I'm fine. But it ran away. Why...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Its frequency is becoming more unstable. If it doesn't get tuned soon and encounters more Tacet Discords...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's my fault for scaring it off... I was too reckless. How could I mess up something so simple...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry you had to see that, {PlayerName}. I... I messed up again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's nothing. Please forget it. Let's move on, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you. I'm fine, {PlayerName}. Let's move on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry for worrying you. I've just been a little off these past few days.

Options.PlotLineKey: You're on vacation. You should relax!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, you're right. The truth is, I took this break to clear my mind and gather myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I feel more lost than ever... If this keeps up, I won't even be a good guide for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. Let's move on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, that sounds like something Zani would say. Thank you for comforting me, {PlayerName}. Now, let's move on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That Echo fled north, and north of Averardo Vault is the Fagaceae Peninsula, which just so happens to be our next destination.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Those wisps are its traces, right? That means...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As long as we continue to follow them, we should be on the right track.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to doctrine, all Echoes in Rinascita exist and thrive due to the Sentinel's blessings.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're the Sentinel's envoys, conveying Their blessings and proof of the bond between Them and the people.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've never seen an Echo like that... but now it's appeared before me. Could this be a sign from the Sentinel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, let's move on.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll do my best to be a good guide for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eh? Were you taking photos of me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm a little embarrassed, but still, I appreciate you taking pictures of our journey together.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such memories are precious to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... could you also help take some photos of the wisps left by this Echo?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Averardo Vault wasn't one of the Order's commissioned projects, but it never ceases to amaze me whenever I see it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If only the Montelli family could hold the Sentinel in the same regard as they do their riches…

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look over there! Aren't they the same type of will-o'-the-wisps we encountered at the Thorncrown Rises?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I never expected to see it again... What's really happening here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In any case, could you please take a photo of it, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, {PlayerName}. These photos will greatly aid my research when I return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But unfortunately, we still haven't found that Echo.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wonder how it's doing now. Is it alright? Oh no, could it be hiding from me?

Options.PlotLineKey: It must be having a good time somewhere else.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If I can't even find an Echo...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah... I see... I...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Even so, it's still in a dangerous situation.

Options.PlotLineKey: Don't worry Phoebe, you have done a lot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I... {PlayerName}, do you remember Lorelei? We encountered her in Nimbus Sanctum with Zani.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: She said that the Sentinel could no longer deliver Their oracles...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since then, I've poured over countless texts. But the more I search, the more lost I feel. It's as if I've been blindfolded and tossed into the sea...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps I'm not devout or wise enough to uncover the truth... I often wonder how the Sentinel is faring now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Every time I think of your stunning performance at the Carnevale, I feel as though I've missed something right in front of me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But what is it? I still haven't figured it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before today, I thought the sight of Oakheart Highcourt would offer me a revelation, just like the sages in the legends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But the oracles on the stone walls and the oak branches feel so silent and distant...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I'm not doubting my faith. I suppose... I'm doubting myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My apologies. I didn't mean to show you this side of me again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Was that...?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's the Echo we've been searching for.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, it seems to be trying to avoid being noticed by Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's fleeing northwest... toward Penitent's End.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it trying to go home?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're right. Let's hurry and catch up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Greetings, {PlayerName}. What a pleasant surprise to see you here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It feels like it's been so long since we last crossed paths at the Carnevale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though belated, congratulations on receiving the Laurel. Your performance that day... was truly unforgettable.

Options.PlotLineKey: Guess I'm rather talented at this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to your splendid performance, the Carnevale, which hadn't been held for a decade, came to a perfect conclusion. Ragunna is now filled with joy and laughter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You played yourself? Hehe, you truly are a brave and sincere soul.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perhaps it is this very honesty that allowed you to claim the Laurel and set the stage alight.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to your splendid performance, the Carnevale, which hadn't been held for a decade, came to a perfect conclusion. Ragunna is now filled with joy and laughter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! I didn't expect you to take that compliment so well...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I suppose that is why you shone as the brightest star at the Carnevale.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks to your splendid performance, the Carnevale, which hadn't been held for a decade, came to a perfect conclusion. Ragunna is now filled with joy and laughter.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With such joyous songs echoing throughout the city... Surely even the Sentinel can hear them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of the Carnevale's conclusion, as the Laureate, what do you plan to do now?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm taking a tour around Ragunna.
I'm looking for traces of the Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That sounds lovely. By the way, I'm on vacation and planning to visit some sacred sites myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're interested, would you like to join me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seeking traces of the Sentinel... I see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm actually on vacation and plan to visit some sacred sites myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some of them are rich with legends about the Sentinel. If you're interested, would you like to join me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? Planning to confront the powerful Tacet Discords in Ragunna?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In that case, you might find some formidable ones lurking in certain remote, forgotten ruins.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, I'm on vacation and plan to visit some sacred sites myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're interested in the ruins and ancient buildings of Ragunna, I'd be glad to show you around. Would you like to join me?

Options.PlotLineKey: Wonderful! I'd love a free tour guide!

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, I'll do my best to be a good guide.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well then, {Male=Signor;Female=Signorina} {PlayerName}, please look this way.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cross this bridge, and we'll arrive at Thessaleo Fells.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There you'll see rolling highlands and coastal plains, along with grand architectural marvels built by the ancient nobility in partnership with the Order.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about we make that our first destination?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of which, there's a Wingray over there. If you'd like to try flying one, we can take it to Averardo Vault.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, look, there's a Wingray over there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We don't have much time, so let's take a Wingray and go.
